articles.title: First on CNN: Meadows cooperating with January 6 investigators - CNN
articles.description: Donald Trump's former chief of staff Mark Meadows is cooperating with the House select committee investigating the January 6 riot and is providing records and agreeing to appear for an initial interview, CNN first reported Tuesday.
